name: France
startIntroPart1: Behold Marie Antoinette, Queen of France, whose reign saw both the glittering heights of Versailles and the brewing tensions that would shake the nation to its core. Renowned for her patronage of the arts and refinement of courtly culture, she navigated the delicate politics of the French monarchy in a time of great upheaval, leaving a legacy of elegance and sophistication that still echoes through history.
startIntroPart2: Oh noble and illustrious queen, will you once again guide the Kingdom of France through the trials of diplomacy and governance? Will you elevate your people with the splendor of your court, the richness of your culture, and the wisdom of your decisions? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Must we resort to arms? Very well, the crown commands it!
defeated: This is most regrettable…yet history will remember our elegance.
introduction: I am Marie Antoinette, Queen of France. Let diplomacy and refinement guide our relations.
hateHello: You vex me with your presence.
afterPeace: Finally, some tranquility. Let us savor it.
tradeRequest: We present this gift in the spirit of mutual prosperity.
